Package adrenaline.server.network

Class LobbyExportable

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • adrenaline.server.network.LobbyExportable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LobbyAPI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class LobbyExportable
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements LobbyAPI
    The LobbyExportable extends UnicastRemoteObject implements LobbyAPI, to received action request from client terminal and return the result of operation
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
